colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI RDO RJE @011B LEGS PA'I BSKANG BSHAGS BSTOD BSKUL DANG BCAS PA 'DI NI ^SKYAMS MGON DAM PA BA BSO SPRUL BA'I SKU BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA GZHI BYAS KHA BSKONG 'GA' ZHIG ^SKYAMS MGON PAN CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA SKU GONG 'OG DANG, SLE'U LUNG GSANG BDAG SPRUL SKU SOGS GYI PE CHA LAS GTUS, GTOR RDZONG SOGS 'GA' ZHIG RANG GI NGAG RTZOM BCAS BSDUS NAS BSGRIGS PA SPANG PO'I PHYI LTA BU 'DI NI DPA' SHOD KYI GRA TSANG 'GRO PHAN DAR RGYAS GLING GI BSKANG BA MANG PA'I GRAL DU 'DZUD RGYUD, SNGAR SGRIGS 'DUN YOD KYANG MA RIM 'GYANGS DANG, YANG BSGYAR RANG LA TSOS BSRUS 'DI NYID NYI BA'I MTSAN MA MANG TZAM SHAR BA BCAS ^RTA TSAG SPRUL MING YE SHES BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I MGON POS DPAL LDAN 'BRAS SPUNGS CHOS KYI SDE CHEN POR RGYAL ZLA'I YAR TSE BCO LNGA LA LEGS PA BSTIGS PA'O, ,'DI BRIS BRA'I BSOD NAMS KYIS, BSTAN 'GRO LA PHAN DANG, CHOS BSGRUB PA'I GAL RKYEN KUN, MI MTHUN RKYEN 'GRUB PAR SHOG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm BHA WANTU,, ,,)
